subtitle.label: Subtitle
subtitle.default: Let the Professional handle your work

description.label: Content Description
description.default: An artist is a person engaged in an activity related to creating art, practicing the arts, or demonstrating an art. The common usage in both everyday speech and academic discourse refers to a practitioner in the visual arts only. However, the term is also often used in the entertainment business, especially in a business context, for musicians and other performers (although less often for actors).
